quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to take the keycard from the locker. And then, make it so that the chest is unlocked with the keycard. And then, assure that the chest is wide open. After that, recover the type 7 keycard from the chest. And then, go to the east. Once you get around to doing that, unlock the type 7 chest with the type 7 keycard. And then, open the type 7 chest inside the closet. And then, retrieve the salad from the type 7 chest within the closet. After that, take a trip west. Then, eat the salad. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: unlock type 7 chest with type 7 keycard
unlock type 7 chest with type 7 keycard

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a spare room.

 You see a chest.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if] You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker nearby.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a crate.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You are in an attic. An usual kind of place.

 You see a workbench. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the workbench. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You can make out a shelf. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You arrive in a closet. A normal one.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 7 chest, which looks standard, nearby.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The type 7 chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a stand. [if there is something on the s_2]On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_2]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've entered a bar.

 You can see a non-euclidean safe. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The non-euclidean safe contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The non-euclidean safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. An ordinary kind of place.

 You make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the mantelpiece you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a chamber. A standard one. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 Oh, great. Here's a basket. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a bedchamber. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can make out a bed stand. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the bed stand. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Of every office you could have sauntered into, you had to walk into a standard one.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] mahogany passageway leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

You've just walked into a cookery.



There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've entered a vault. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can see a rack. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_5] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a cubicle. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You are in a restroom. It seems to be pretty usual here. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a board. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the board. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the east.

 You scan the room, seeing a table. The table is rusty.[if there is something on the s_8] On the rusty table you can make out [a list of things on the s_8]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] mahogany passageway leading north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

 You make out a table. The table is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_10] On the table you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a counter. [if there is something on the s_11]You see [a list of things on the s_11] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

walkthrough: unlock type 7 chest with type 7 keycard

objective: You are now playing a profound game of TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to retrieve the keycard from the locker. And then, insert the keycard into the chest's lock to unlock it. After that, make absolutely sure that the chest is wide open. And then, retrieve the type 7 keycard from the chest within the spare room. Then, make an attempt to take a trip east. And then, make it so that the type 7 chest is unlocked. Once you have unlocked the type 7 chest, ensure that the type 7 chest within the closet is open. Then, take the salad from the type 7 chest in the closet. If you can get your hands on the salad, eat the salad. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
